text:

University of Kansas:

Justice

Department

School of Professional Studies

Primary Campus

University...
Lawrence, Kansas, United States
 ## Title
University of Kansas: Assist/Assoc/Full Professor of the Practice - Criminal Justice

## Source
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889196/assist-assoc-full-professor-of-the-practice-criminal-justice/?TrackID=10

## Posted Date
2025-09-22T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889196/assist-assoc-full-professor-of-the-practice-criminal-justice/?TrackID=10

## Location
Lawrence, Kansas, United States (KU Lawrence campus)

## Salary
Commensurate with experience

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements

*   Master’s degree from a nationally accredited university in Criminal Justice, or closely related field, is expected by the start date of the appointment.
*   Years of related experience in criminal justice required for each rank:
    *   Assistant Professor of the Practice: 3-5 years
    *   Associate Professor of the Practice: 6-15 years
    *   Professor of the Practice: 16+ years
*   Excellence in written communication skills as demonstrated in application materials

## Summary
### 岗位概述：

该职位是一年制的非终身教职，承担教学和服务责任。该职位预计保持正常办公时间，并在周末或晚上如需要出席活动。助理/协同教授/教授的实践工作与程序导师一起提供课程和对学生在犯罪学（CRIM）以及此新计划可能开发的任何扩展中的支持。

### 岗位职责：

*   管理课程开发和设计（包括课程转换和在线和混合课程的发展）
*   提供劳伦斯课堂和在线教学
*   为这些程序提供学术支持，相关长期课程开发，学生招生和入学，学生保留，程序质量和评估，社区 outreach，和校友发展

### 任职要求：

*   硕士或以上学位
*   3-5年经验（助理教授）
*   6-15年经验（协同教授）
*   16+年经验（教授）

### 岗位优势：

*   工作环境：KU的工作环境是多元化和包容性的，提供了一个支持员工成长和发展的氛围。
*   福利：
    *   健康保险
    *   生活保险
    *   退休计划

in the School of Education. This is a non-tenure track,...
Carbondale, Illinois, United States
 ## Title
Southern Illinois University at Carbondale: NTT Faculty - Assistant Lecturer/Assistant Professor of Practice - OLID

## Source
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889132/ntt-faculty-assistant-lecturer-assistant-professor-of-practice-olid/?TrackID=10

## Posted Date
2025-09-22T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889132/ntt-faculty-assistant-lecturer-assistant-professor-of-practice-olid/?TrackID=10

## Location
Carbondale, Illinois, United States

## Salary
Competitive salary, target offer: $3750.00 monthly (prorated for part-time appointments)

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
1. Minimum Qualifications:
	* Applicants for the Assistant Lecturer rank must have completed a master’s degree.
	* For those holding a doctoral degree, appointment will be at the rank of Assistant Professor of Practice.
2. Experience teaching at the postsecondary level, such as within a 2-year and 4-year college, military, or in business and industry.

## Summary
### 岗位信息

* 岗位名称：Southern Illinois University at Carbondale: NTT Faculty - Assistant Lecturer/Assistant Professor of Practice - OLID
* 所属单位：Southern Illinois University at Carbondale
* 岗位类型：非终身教职（Non-tenure track）
* 工作地点：Carbondale, Illinois, United States

### 负责内容

* 教学学生在教育硕士和本科生课程中，包括在线教学
* 参与学校的组织学习、创新和发展等课程

### 资格要求

* 最低资格：
	+ 助理讲师职位需要获得硕士学位
	+ 拥有博士学位者将被任命为助理教授
* 经验要求：至少有一年以上的教学经验，尤其是在二年制和四年制大学、军队或企业中

### 联系方式

* 联系人：William Carr（william.carr@siu.edu）
* 应聘方式：通过Chronicle of Higher Education Jobs网站提交申请

 ## Title
Southern Illinois University at Carbondale: Education Assistant Professor

## Source
The Chronicle of Higher Education Jobs

## Posted Date
2025-09-22T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889133/education-assistant-professor/?TrackID=10

## Location
Carbondale, Illinois, United States

## Salary
Competitive salary, target offer for this position at full-time is $7,333.33 monthly.

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education
* Physiology
* Biotechnology

## Recruitment requirements
* Ph.D. in Physiology or a closely related field
* 1 year of experience as an Instructor, Lecturer, or Assistant Professor in Physiology, Biotechnology, or closely related field

## Summary
**教育助理教授**
南伊利诺斯大学卡布多尔分校寻求一名全职非终身制教育助理教授，负责提供教学服务于本科生、研究生和医学学生。该职位需要具有博士学位的资格，并有1年以上的教学经验。具体要求包括：
* 提供一般生理学、心血管生理学、药理学、分子生物学和/或男性生殖系统生理学等课程的讲课和实验室指导
* 为医学学生提供第一年医学课程的辅导
* 开发具有在线组件的毕业生/本科生课程以支持远程学习
* 参与部门和大学委员会
* 出席部门会议
* 执行其他学术职责

该职位的薪水为竞争性，目标月薪为 $7,333.33。

text:
Assistant Professor of Teacher Education & Curriculum Studies / UMKC School of Education, Social Work & Psychological Studies University of Missouri - Kansas City (Kansas City, MO) ## Title

2025-09-19T19:31:22Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Location
Kansas City, MO

## Salary
Not specified

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education
* Literacy & Language Culture
* Chinese Teaching

## Recruitment requirements
* Request was unsuccessful, no specific requirements mentioned.

## Summary 
**职位名称**: UMKC教育学院助理教授（Teacher Education & Curriculum Studies）

**工作内容**：该职位要求研究和教学领域的专家，特别是课程与教学、教育技术以及教师教育等方向。 

**任职资格**：

* 有助教或讲师经验者优先考虑
* 具有教育学博士学位（Ph.D.）
* 能够在课堂上使用多种教学方法和工具
* 在教育研究领域有出色的出版记录
* 能够与学生、教师和社区合作

**工作职责**：

* 教授课程与教学、教育技术以及教师教育等课程
* 进行教育研究并发表论文
* 与学生、教师和社区合作，促进教育发展

* 在教育研究领域有出色的出版记录
* 能够与学生、教师和社区合作

**工作职责**：

* 教授课程与教学、教育技术以及教师教育等课程
* 进行教育研究并发表论文
* 与学生、教师和社区合作，促进教育发展

## Keywords
Arts & Humanities, Social Sciences, Life Sciences, Public Health, Engineering & Technology, Math & Statistics, Languages & Education, Athletics, Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer

## Recruitment requirements
* High-caliber, multidisciplinary educators from top institutions
* PhD or equivalent with teaching excellent
* Open to innovative pedagogy & collaboration
* Flexible in-person terms: single trimester or longer

## Summary
###  Asian University for Women Faculty Appointments (Bangladesh)

Asian University for Women (AUW) invites exceptional, multidisciplinary faculty to join our mission of educating the next generation of women leaders from across Asia and the Middle East. We are seeking high-caliber educators with a PhD or equivalent in various fields.

**Responsibilities:**

* Teach undergraduate and graduate students
* Conduct research and publish scholarly work
* Participate in curriculum development and departmental service

**Requirements:**

* PhD or equivalent in relevant field
* Teaching experience at the university level
* Strong commitment to innovative pedagogy and collaboration
* Flexibility with in-person teaching terms (single trimester or longer)

**Benefits:**

* Competitive, tax-free USD salary for non-Bangladeshi nationals
* Housing, health insurance, airfare & visa support
* Inclusive, multicultural campus community

**How to Apply:**

Please email your application materials to [jobs@asian-university.org](mailto:jobs@asian-university.org).

Arts & Humanities, Social Sciences, Life Sciences, Public Health, Engineering & Technology, Math & Statistics, Languages & Education, Athletics, Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer

## Recruitment requirements
* High-caliber, multidisciplinary educators from top institutions
* PhD or equivalent with teaching excellent
* Open to innovative pedagogy & collaboration
* Flexible in-person terms: single trimester or longer

## Summary
###  Asian University for Women Faculty Appointments (Bangladesh)

Asian University for Women (AUW) invites exceptional, multidisciplinary faculty to join our mission of educating the next generation of women leaders from across Asia and the Middle East. We are seeking high-caliber educators with a PhD or equivalent in various fields.

**Responsibilities:**

* Teach undergraduate and graduate students
* Conduct research and publish scholarly work
* Participate in curriculum development and departmental service

**Requirements:**

* PhD or equivalent in relevant field
* Teaching experience at the university level
* Strong commitment to innovative pedagogy and collaboration
* Flexibility with in-person teaching terms (single trimester or longer)

**Benefits:**

* Competitive, tax-free USD salary for non-Bangladeshi nationals
* Housing, health insurance, airfare & visa support
* Inclusive, multicultural campus community

**How to Apply:**

Please email your application materials to [jobs@asian-university.org](mailto:jobs@asian-university.org).

## Location
Round Rock, Texas, United States

## Salary
Competitive Salary

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Anatomy & Physiology

## Recruitment requirements
*   Faculty teaching general education courses at the undergraduate level: doctor's or master's degree in the teaching discipline or master's degree with a concentration in the teaching discipline (a minimum of 18 graduate semester hours in the teaching discipline).
*   Experience in instruction or formalized education process, preferably in a post-secondary or college institution.
*   Membership in a professional association tied to the area of instruction preferred.
*   Active, valid, and unencumbered state licensure or certification as applicable to the discipline.

## Summary
### 岗位概述

该职位为南大学（South University）的临时教职员工，负责教授解剖学和生理学课程。 

### 岗位职责

*   指导学生学习并促进积极的教育体验。
*   执行教职员工职责，如在《南大学员工手册》的补充部分中规定的那样。
*   提供与南大学课程模式和系统交付风格相符的课程指导。
*   设计并交付教学计划，以实现课程目标，并为在线课程提供批准的每个课程 shell 中的指导。

### 资格要求

*   在相关领域获得博士或硕士学位，或者在相关领域获得硕士学位（至少 18 个毕业学分）。
*   有经验在教学或正式教育过程中，尤其是在高等教育机构。
*   与教学领域相关的专业协会成员。
*   相关领域有效、未受限制的州执照或认证。

### 工作环境

该工作环境描述如下代表了员工执行本职责时遇到的情况。有可能根据需要为残疾人提供适当的调整。

text:
Wichita State University: Tenure-Track Assistant Professor In Experimental Condensed Matter Physics Competitive Salary:

Wichita State University:
Department: Physics division of the department of
Mathematics, Statistics. and Physics

Campus Location: Wichita, KS - WSU Main Campus

Hire Type:...
Wichita, Kansas, United States
 ## Title
Wichita State University: Tenure-Track Assistant Professor In Experimental Condensed Matter Physics

## Source
Job Search RSS

## Posted Date
2025-09-19T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889269/tenure-track-assistant-professor-in-experimental-condensed-matter-physics/?TrackID=10

## Location
Wichita, KS - WSU Main Campus

## Salary
Commensurate with experience

## Keywords
*   Curriculum and Instruction
*   Educational Technology
*   Teacher Education
*   Tenure-track
*   Assistant Professor
*   Lecturer
*   Quantum Materials
*   Quantum Information Science and Engineering (QISE)

## Recruitment requirements
*   PhD degree in physics, material sciences, or a closely related discipline with postdoctoral experience.
*   Demonstrated potential for effective teaching. Evidence may include prior teaching experience, student evaluations, teaching awards, or a statement of teaching philosophy describing their conceptualizations of teaching and learning, and teaching and assessment methods, and how their teaching practices will engage students from a range of backgrounds and experiences.
*   Demonstrated potential for productive research and scholarship. This can be shown by publications, conference presentations, dissertation work, or other scholarly activities indicating the ability to develop an independent research program.

## Summary
### 岗位概述

该职位是物理学领域的终身教职助理教授，研究方向为实验凝聚态物理。该岗位要求具有博士学位，并有教学经验和研究潜力。

### 岗位职责

*   教学：负责在本科和硕士水平上开设课程，包括量子力学、光学等基础物理课。还需要设计课程内容和教材、授课和评估学生学习成果。
*   研究/学术活动：建立并维持一个全国知名的研究项目。包括发表学术论文、在学术会议上报告结果，并寻求外部资金支持研究活动。
*   服务：承担部门、学院或大学的服务任务，包括委员会工作、课程开发、程序评估、学生招生和社区宣传等。

### 岗位资格

*   博士学位在物理学、材料科学或相关领域，并有博士后经验。
*   具备有效教学潜力。可以通过以前的教学经历、学生评价、教学奖项或教学理念陈述来证明。该理念应该描述他们对教学和学习的概念，以及如何让不同背景和经验的学生参与到课程中去。
*   具备研究和学术活动的潜力。这可以通过发表论文、会议报告、博士论文工作或其他学术活动来证明。这些活动应该能够表明他们有能力建立一个独立的研究项目。

### 其他要求

*   能够在一个高度合作、动态且多样化的环境中有效工作。
*   具备高质量教学和评估学生学习成果的能力。
*   具备良好的口头和书面沟通技巧。
*   能够适应 Wichita State 的跨学科和应用性学习重点。

The Department of Teacher Education and Leadership at Mississippi
State University (MSU) is seeking applications for a...
Mississippi State, Mississippi, United States
 ## Title
Mississippi State University: Assistant or Associate Professor

## Source
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889139/assistant-or-associate-professor/?TrackID=10 (Job Search RSS)

## Posted Date
2025-09-19T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889139/assistant-or-associate-professor/?TrackID=10

## Location
Mississippi State, Mississippi, United States

## Salary
Competitive Salary (Salary Grade UC)

## Keywords
* Educational Leadership
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Teacher Education
* Tenure-track
* Assistant Professor
* Lecturer
* Literacy & Language Culture
* Chinese Teaching
* AI Instructional technology

## Recruitment requirements
* An earned doctorate, with an emphasis on educational leadership and demonstrated potential in areas of teaching, advising, research, grant writing, and service. ABD will be considered with completion of the doctorate before the start date.
* The ability to teach Educational Leadership classes in the Ed Leadership graduate programs.
* Administrative experience in P-12 education at the school and/or district level.
* Technology skills required for online instruction.
* Record of publication, scholarly presentations and research in field of expertise.

## Summary
### 岗位信息

* 岗位名称：助理或副教授
* 所属单位：密西西比州立大学
* 地点：密西西比州州立，美国
* 工作性质：全职（9个月）
* 职责：
	+ 教授5门研究生课程，每年混合面授和在线教学。
	+ 从事领域专长的研究工作。
	+ 助理教育领导学位候选人。
	+ 参与部门委员会和部门会议/活动。
	+ 提供高质量的教学服务。
	+ 与教育领导学位候选人和同事合作。
* 资格：
	+ 博士学位，重点在教育领导领域，并表现出教学、辅导、研究、申请资金和服务方面的潜力。 ABD 将考虑完成博士学位之前的开始日期。
	+ 能够教授教育领导课程在Ed Leadership硕士项目中。
	+ P-12教育中的行政经验（学校或地区级别）。
	+ 在线教学所需的技术技能。
	+ 在领域专长方面的出版记录、学术演讲和研究。

### 应聘要求

* 申请人必须在线申请，并包括以下材料：
	+ 一份封面信
	+ 简历
	+ 教学理念陈述
	+ 研究陈述
	+ 未经认证的成绩单副本
	+ 至少四位专业参考人员的名单，包括完整的联系信息

### 联系方式

* 应聘者应将材料作为附件上传在线申请中。
* 封面信请寄Kenneth V. Anthony, PhD, 部门主管，MSU Mailstop 9705, 310 Allen Hall, MS State, MS 37962。

### 平等就业机会声明

密西西比州立大学是一家平等机会机构。根据适用的法律，大学在招聘、项目或活动中不允许歧视基于种族、颜色、民族、性别、怀孕、宗教、国籍、残疾、年龄、性取向、基因信息、美国退伍军人地位或任何其他状态。有关平等机会计划或遵守问题，请联系民权监察部门，231 Famous Maroon Band Street, P.O. 6044, Mississippi State, MS 39762，(662) 325-5839。

### 如果需要就业机会适应

根据ADA法案，密西西比州立大学致力于为所有人提供平等的就业机会。有关如何获得帮助，请联系人力资源部门，P.O. Box 6017, Mississippi State, MS 39762，或电邮至 [hrdept@msstate.edu](mailto:hrdept@msstate.edu) 或电话 (662) 325-3713。

	+ 从事领域专长的研究工作。
	+ 助理教育领导学位候选人。
	+ 参与部门委员会和部门会议/活动。
	+ 提供高质量的教学服务。
	+ 与教育领导学位候选人和同事合作。
* 资格：
	+ 博士学位，重点在教育领导领域，并表现出教学、辅导、研究、申请资金和服务方面的潜力。 ABD 将考虑完成博士学位之前的开始日期。
	+ 能够教授教育领导课程在Ed Leadership硕士项目中。
	+ P-12教育中的行政经验（学校或地区级别）。
	+ 在线教学所需的技术技能。
	+ 在领域专长方面的出版记录、学术演讲和研究。

### 应聘要求

* 申请人必须在线申请，并包括以下材料：
	+ 一份封面信
	+ 简历
	+ 教学理念陈述
	+ 研究陈述
	+ 未经认证的成绩单副本
	+ 至少四位专业参考人员的名单，包括完整的联系信息

### 联系方式

* 应聘者应将材料作为附件上传在线申请中。
* 封面信请寄Kenneth V. Anthony, PhD, 部门主管，MSU Mailstop 9705, 310 Allen Hall, MS State, MS 37962。

### 平等就业机会声明

密西西比州立大学是一家平等机会机构。根据适用的法律，大学在招聘、项目或活动中不允许歧视基于种族、颜色、民族、性别、怀孕、宗教、国籍、残疾、年龄、性取向、基因信息、美国退伍军人地位或任何其他状态。有关平等机会计划或遵守问题，请联系民权监察部门，231 Famous Maroon Band Street, P.O. 6044, Mississippi State, MS 39762，(662) 325-5839。

### 如果需要就业机会适应

根据ADA法案，密西西比州立大学致力于为所有人提供平等的就业机会。有关如何获得帮助，请联系人力资源部门，P.O. Box 6017, Mississippi State, MS 39762，或电邮至 [hrdept@msstate.edu](mailto:hrdept@msstate.edu) 或电话 (662) 325-3713。

 ## Title
University at Buffalo: Clinical Education Curriculum Coordinator, Phases 2/3, Office of Medical Curriculum

## Source
Job Search RSS

## Posted Date
2025-09-19T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
10/02/2025

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889017/clinical-education-curriculum-coordinator-phases-2-3-office-of-medical-curriculum/?TrackID=10

## Location
New York, United States

## Salary
$55,000 - $60,000

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Medical Education, Academic Program Coordination

## Recruitment requirements
*   Bachelor’s degree in education, health professions, higher education administration, or related field.
*   3 years of professional experience in medical education or academic program coordination.
*   Experience managing complex projects with multiple stakeholders.
*   Proficiency in educational technology systems (e.g., MedHub, NBME systems, Microsoft Office Suite).
*   Strong organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills.

## Summary
### 岗位概述

该职位由Office of Medical Curriculum负责，主要负责MD课程的临床教育阶段。该角色将协助助理院长和行政总监来监督Well Beyond课程的执行、协调和评估。

### 关键责任：

*   协调和标准化Phase 2（核心实习）和Phase 3（高级临床与住院准备）的课程交付。
*   管理MedHub评估，跟踪评估，并且完成LCME认证文档。
*   管理MedHub和E-Passport系统；担任NBME首席监考员，负责安全考试的管理。
*   与教职工、课程导师、临床场所和学生合作来支持课程实施和沟通。
*   协助测试和临床适应性与可访问性资源合作，以确保ADA和NBME遵守。
*   为课程领导提供行政和战略支持，包括政策制定和考察准备。

### 最低资格要求：

*   学士学位在教育、健康专业、高等教育管理或相关领域。
*   3年专业经验在医学教育或学术项目协调中。
*   经验管理复杂的项目与多个利益相关者。
*   熟悉教育技术系统（例如MedHub，NBME系统，Microsoft Office套件）。
*   强大的组织、沟通和人际关系技能。

### 推荐资格要求：

*   硕士学位在教育、公共卫生、学生事务或相关领域。
*   经验在医学课程交付或LCME认证中。
*   经验系统管理或数据报告在临床或学术环境中。

## Summary
### 申请职位：卡内基梅隆大学全职终身教职教授

#### 职位描述：

卡内基梅隆大学生物医学工程系招聘全职终身教职教授，研究领域包括免疫工程和生物医学人工智能。该职位要求具有生物医学工程或相关领域的博士学位，并有出色的研究表现和教学经验。

* 提交申请信
* 提交完整的简历
* 提交2页的研究计划
* 提交2页的教学兴趣陈述
* 提交对专业服务的贡献陈述

#### 工作地点：

卡内格里梅隆大学位于美国宾夕法尼亚州匹兹堡市。

#### 申请截止日期：

2025年11月16日。

#### 联系方式：

请访问https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37889252/full-time-tenure-track-faculty-member/?TrackID=10进行在线申请。

title: University of Tennessee, Knoxville: Non-Tenure Track Online Faculty Position
text: University of Tennessee, Knoxville: Non-Tenure Track Online Faculty Position Competitive Salary: University of Tennessee, Knoxville: Description The College of Emerging and Collaborative Studies (CECS) at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville... Knoxville, Tennessee, United States ## Title University of Tennessee, Knoxville: Non-Tenure Track Online Faculty Position ## Source Job Search RSS ## Posted Date 2025-09-17T04:00:00.000Z ## Deadline October 15, 2025 ## Application Link https://apply.interfolio.com/174173 ## Location Knoxville, Tennessee, United States ## Salary Not specified ## Keywords Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer, Literacy & Language Culture, Chinese Teaching, AI Instructional technology ## Recruitment requirements * Candidates must have a doctoral degree and evidence of expertise in data science, applied artificial intelligence, and other applied computing fields. * Higher education teaching experience is required. * Experience or demonstrated ability in the design and delivery of courses in a variety of formats, including face-to-face, synchronous online, asynchronous online, and hybrid is preferred. * Experience with technology-enhanced teaching and knowledge of team-based practices in teaching is expected. ## Summary **描述** 该职位由 [College of Emerging and Collaborative Studies](http://www.cecs.utk.edu/) (CECS) 在 University of Tennessee, Knoxville (UTK) 提供。该部门正在寻找具有动态、协作和创新精神的非终身教员来为应用网络安全（CYBR）提供在线课程。该职位是 12 个月的非终身教员，开始时间尽快，目标起始日期不晚于 2026 年 1 月。根据大学的使命，该选定候选人将负责教学和服务。教学任务由院长根据学生需求和调度安排确定。主要教学职责包括开发和提供在线异步课程，涵盖应用 CYBR 课程。 * **应用网络安全课程** : 网络安全概念、加密和数据保护、网络安全工具、网络安全风险管理、网络安全政策框架、网络控制系统的网络安全、网络犯罪和数字执法。 * 服务于该学院不需要在课程开发阶段，但可能由院长分配。成功候选人将表现出强烈的兴趣和能力，能够教导 CECS 的毕业生和本科生课程、证书和小数。该职位可完全远程。 **资格** * 候选人必须拥有博士学位，并提供数据科学、应用人工智能和其他应用计算领域的专家知识。优先考虑具有数学、统计学、计算机科学、工程或相关领域学位的候选人。 * 候选人必须能够开发并交付在线本科和执行课程，涵盖应用人工智能、数据科学、分析方法、数据管理、处理和可视化等主题。 * 高等教育教学经验是必需的。 * 面向多种格式（面对面、同步在线、异步在线和混合）的课程设计和交付经验或表现出能力是有利的。 * 经验丰富的人工智能教学和知识管理实践以及团队合作教学实践是期望的。 * 成功应聘者应该具有卓越的教学和服务承诺。 * 有大量专业经验是非常有吸引力的。

## Recruitment requirements
*   Candidates must have a doctoral degree and evidence of expertise in data science, applied artificial intelligence, and other applied computing fields.
*   Higher education teaching experience is required.
*   Experience or demonstrated ability in the design and delivery of courses in a variety of formats, including face-to-face, synchronous online, asynchronous online, and hybrid is preferred.
*   Experience with technology-enhanced teaching and knowledge of team-based practices in teaching is expected.

## Summary
**描述**

该职位由 [College of Emerging and Collaborative Studies](http://www.cecs.utk.edu/) (CECS) 在 University of Tennessee, Knoxville (UTK) 提供。该部门正在寻找具有动态、协作和创新精神的非终身教员来为应用网络安全（CYBR）提供在线课程。该职位是 12 个月的非终身教员，开始时间尽快，目标起始日期不晚于 2026 年 1 月。根据大学的使命，该选定候选人将负责教学和服务。教学任务由院长根据学生需求和调度安排确定。主要教学职责包括开发和提供在线异步课程，涵盖应用 CYBR 课程。

*   **应用网络安全课程** : 网络安全概念、加密和数据保护、网络安全工具、网络安全风险管理、网络安全政策框架、网络控制系统的网络安全、网络犯罪和数字执法。
*   服务于该学院不需要在课程开发阶段，但可能由院长分配。成功候选人将表现出强烈的兴趣和能力，能够教导 CECS 的毕业生和本科生课程、证书和小数。该职位可完全远程。

**资格**

*   候选人必须拥有博士学位，并提供数据科学、应用人工智能和其他应用计算领域的专家知识。优先考虑具有数学、统计学、计算机科学、工程或相关领域学位的候选人。
*   候选人必须能够开发并交付在线本科和执行课程，涵盖应用人工智能、数据科学、分析方法、数据管理、处理和可视化等主题。
*   高等教育教学经验是必需的。
*   面向多种格式（面对面、同步在线、异步在线和混合）的课程设计和交付经验或表现出能力是有利的。
*   经验丰富的人工智能教学和知识管理实践以及团队合作教学实践是期望的。
*   成功应聘者应该具有卓越的教学和服务承诺。
*   有大量专业经验是非常有吸引力的。

title: Education Department: Teaching Professor and Director of Teacher Education (Initial Review Date Nov. 12, 2025)
text:
Education Department: Teaching Professor and Director of Teacher Education (Initial Review Date Nov. 12, 2025) University of California Santa Cruz (Santa Cruz, CA) ## Title
Education Department: Teaching Professor and Director of Teacher Education (Initial Review Date Nov. 12, 2025)

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Teacher Education

## Posted Date
Not specified

## Deadline
- Initial review date: November 12, 2025
- Final date: June 30, 2026

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179242786

## Location
University of California, Santa Cruz (UCSC)

## Salary
$95,000-170,000 per year (commensurate with qualifications and experience)

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer, Literacy & Language Culture, Chinese Teaching

## Recruitment requirements
- Basic qualifications:
  - Doctorate (or equivalent foreign degree) in education or related field such as sociology, social welfare, or human development;
  - PreK-12 teaching experience;
  - Experience with the teacher credentialing process;
  - Experience with data management, budget development, and reporting;
  - Demonstrated experience with teaching/training pre-service teachers at the college/university level;
  - Experience with inclusive pedagogy;
  - Experience leading institutional change to improve learning experience.
- It is expected that the degree requirement will be completed by June 30, 2026.

## Summary
### 岗位概述

该教育部门正在招聘一名教学教授和教师教育主任。该岗位为全职（100%），预计于2026年7月1日开始。

### 费用范围

$95,000-170,000每年（根据资格和经验而定）

### 应聘者资格

- 基本资格：
  - 教育或相关领域的博士学位（如社会学、社会福利或人类发展）；
  - PreK-12 教育经验；
  -教师认证过程的经验；
  - 数据管理、预算开发和报告的经验；
  - 在大学/学院水平证明过教学/培训前服务老师的经历；
  - 包括性教法的经验；
  - 改善学习体验的领导经验。
- 期望在2026年6月30日之前完成学位要求。

### 应聘者责任

- 建立和维护与教育家和地区学校区管理员的合作关系
- 指导教师监督员和讲师
- 监控学生教学
- 维护学生进度
- 建立校友网络
- 领导报告写作和长期规划
- 遵守加利福尼亚州认证指南

### 应聘者资格

- 教育或相关领域的博士学位（如社会学、社会福利或人类发展）；
- PreK-12 教育经验；
-教师认证过程的经验；
- 数据管理、预算开发和报告的经验；
- 在大学/学院水平证明过教学/培训前服务老师的经历；
- 包括性教法的经验；
- 改善学习体验的领导经验。

### 应聘者优势

- 有加利福尼亚州认证系统和国家教师教育倡议的知识
- 出版和/或基金申请记录
- 重大的PreK-12经验
- 与在职教师专业发展的经验
- 建立和维护学校和社区伙伴关系的能力
- 指导综合前服务教师教育计划的能力
- 在大学/学院水平证明过教学前服务老师的经历

### 应聘者联系方式

应通过UCSC Academic Recruit在线系统递交申请。所有文件和材料必须以PDF格式提交。

*   **简历** - 最近更新的C.V.
*   **覆盖信** - 申请信，总结资格和兴趣，并描述对教师教育和指导教师教育计划的愿景（三页内）。
*   **教学陈述** - 教学经验、兴趣和计划的陈述，适合于UC Santa Cruz的学生。请参阅[教学陈述指南](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XgL_DIo7HZdiWYtIpIPdD7cDy1B1BJ6chchP_VTwTtY/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.itsxl1xomet9)和[评估标准](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qaLxbvxFLZ_YDh6GrypWYsCJ885VeWffaOYdITu4yEE/edit?tab=t.0)。
*   **成果 1：教师教育的记录或创新** - 展

Open Until Filled

## Location
South Charleston, WV 

## Salary
$36,000 - $40,000 

## Keywords
*   Curriculum and Instruction
*   Educational Technology
*   Teacher Education
*   tenure-track
*   Assistant Professor
*   Literacy & Language Culture

## Recruitment requirements
*   Full-time position
*   Grant-funded position
*   Teaching load: 12 contact hours per term, including a 20% load reduction for program coordination
*   Hold office hours, student hours, keep student records, participate in department and division meetings and maintain appropriate assessments, and maintain a minimum of 25 hours on campus

## Summary 
### **职位描述**
BridgeValley Community and Technical College invites applications for a full-time, on-campus faculty position in Elementary Education, beginning in August 2025. The position is primarily located at our South Charleston, WV campus and may include some teaching at our Montgomery location or at off-campus locations.

### **主要职责**

*   Curriculum development, implementation, and assessment in classroom field experience-based settings
*   Teaching, service to students, professional development and service to the institution and community
*   Remain current in the field of elementary education teaching and techniques
*   Advise all program students
*   Work with transfer institutions to ensure curriculum alignment and appropriate academic rigor
*   Ensure program level compliance

text:

South University:


South University provides a warm, supportive learning environment
that will encourage you to join a community of faculty, staff and
students...
Virginia Beach, Virginia, United States
 ## Title
South University: Adjunct Faculty - Nutrition

## Source
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37887677/adjunct-faculty-nutrition/?TrackID=10 (Job Search RSS)

## Posted Date
2025-09-16T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37887677/adjunct-faculty-nutrition/?TrackID=10

## Location
Virginia Beach, Virginia, United States

## Salary
Competitive Salary (Not specified)

## Keywords
- Curriculum and Instruction
- Educational Technology
- Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
*   A master's degree in nutrition or a degree in a related discipline and 18 graduate hours in nutrition classes is required.
*   Graduate teaching assistants: master's in the teaching discipline or 18 graduate semester hours in the teaching discipline, direct supervision by a faculty member experienced in the teaching discipline, regular in-service training, and planned and periodic evaluations.
*   Experience in instruction or formalized education process, preferably in a post-secondary or college institution.
*   Membership in a professional association tied to the area of instruction preferred.
*   Active, valid, and unencumbered state licensure or certification as applicable to the discipline.

## Summary
### 职位名称：南方大学临时教职员-营养学

#### 位置概述：
该职位要求能够指导和促进学生学习的课程内容，并积极支持整个学习环境。提供教育通过学习中心的教学，以使毕业生能够满足市场需求的不断变化。

### 职责：
1.  管理教育过程以确保每个学生都参与了一个积极的教育体验。
2.  执行教职员职责，如《南方大学员工手册》中规定的那样。
3.  提供与南方大学课程模式和支持南方大学系统交付风格相一致的课程教学。
4.  设计和提供通过开发指导计划来实现课程目标、开发支持课堂目标的活动，并在在线课程中，按照每个课程壳中的批准内容进行教学。
5.  有效利用技术来支持学生学习体验。
6.  为学生实现预定义的成就和评估学习而提供指引，通过提供促进专业化并建立学生表现标准和评估的教学。
7.  提供以学习为中心的教学方法，通过创造一个有利于学习和学生参与的教育环境，并有效地规划和准备课程和学生成功。
8.  促进学生成功通过在风格和工作时间上显示灵活性并表现出对教学和学生的热情，并与学生一起参与学习过程。
9.  管理教育环境通过准确记录、按时提交成绩和其他报告，以及执行学术和出席政策，符合学校、校区或在线部门。
10. 与专业/生活/行业经验相结合的学习通过继续专业/技术技能发展、在课程中引入行业观点以及保持对专业/行业趋势和机会的活跃意识。
11. 参与教职员发展过程以增强学习中心指南的知识、技能和能力。
12. 与主管（们）、教职员和其他南方大学行政人员保持一致和有效的沟通。
13. 为学习文化做出贡献，通过参与课程和系统任务队伍、支持本地校区活动，如入学和毕业典礼，以及参加各种其他研讨会和会议。

### 资格：
*   在营养学或相关领域获得硕士学位，并在营养类课程中完成 18 个学分。
*   研究生助教：在教学领域获得硕士学位或 18 个学期的教学领域学分，直接指导由经验丰富的教职员进行，定期培训和计划评估。
*   在指导或正式教育过程中有经验，尤其是在高等教育或大学机构中。
*   与教学领域相关的专业协会成员优先考虑。
*   根据学科适用的有效、活跃且无任何限制的州执照或认证。

title: South University: Adjunct Faculty, Business
text:
South University: Adjunct Faculty, Business Competitive Salary:

South University:


South University provides a warm, supportive learning environment
that will encourage you to join a community of faculty, staff and
students...
Savannah, Georgia, United States
 ## Title
South University: Adjunct Faculty, Business

## Source
Job Search RSS

## Posted Date
2025-09-16T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37887676/adjunct-faculty-business/?TrackID=10

## Location
Savannah, Georgia, United States

## Salary
Competitive Salary

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
*   Faculty teaching graduate and post-baccalaureate course work: earned doctorate/terminal degree in the teaching discipline of Business Administration, Law and/or Economics or a related discipline.
*   Experience in instruction or formalized education process, preferably in a post-secondary or college institution.
*   Membership in a professional association tied to the area of instruction preferred.
*   International Business Experience preferred.
*   At least five years professional experience in the areas of Management, Business Law and/or Economics preferred.

## Summary
### **Job Description**

Adjunct Faculty, Business

South University is seeking an Adjunct Faculty member for its Business program. The successful candidate will be responsible for teaching graduate and post-baccalaureate courses in General Management/Leadership, Law/Ethics and/or Economics. 

### **Key Responsibilities**

*   Manage the educational process to ensure every student is involved in a positive educational experience through the learning, teaching, and social environment.
*   Perform faculty responsibilities as outlined in the faculty job description in accordance with the provisions of Faculty Supplement to the South University Employee Handbook.
*   Provide course instruction that aligns with the South University model of curricula and supports the South University style of system delivery.
*   Design and deliver instruction through the development of instructional plans to meet course outcomes, the development of activities that support lesson objectives, and for online courses, deliver the instruction as approved within each course shell.
*   Effectively utilize technology in the classroom to support the student learning experience.
*   Enable the achievement of pre-defined outcomes for student achievement and evaluation of learning in the areas of General Management/Leadership, Law/Ethics and/or Economics by providing instruction that fosters proficiency and establishes student performance criteria and evaluation.

### **Requirements**

*   Earned doctorate/terminal degree in Business Administration, Law and/or Economics or a related discipline.
*   Experience in instruction or formalized education process, preferably in a post-secondary or college institution.
*   Membership in a professional association tied to the area of instruction preferred.
*   International Business Experience preferred.
*   At least five years professional experience in the areas of Management, Business Law and/or Economics preferred.

### **Work Environment**

The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

 ## Title
Coastal Carolina University: Assistant/Associate Professor of Educational Leadership

## Source
Job Search RSS

## Posted Date
2025-09-16T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Open Until Filled (Yes)

## Application Link
https://jobs.coastal.edu/postings/90451

## Location
Conway, South Carolina, United States

## Salary
Competitive Salary (Not specified)

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor

## Recruitment requirements
- Earned Ph.D./ Ed.D. degree in Educational Leadership
- Leadership experience in a K-12 school setting (traditional public schools or charter/independent/private schools)
- Potential for excellence in teaching at the graduate level based on previous teaching experience
- Potential for excellence in supporting doctoral research projects

## Summary
### 岗位概述

* 岗位名称：教育领导力助理/副教授
* 所属部门：教育科学与组织学系
* 工作类型：全职
* 开始日期：2026年8月15日
* 结束日期：无

### 岗位职责

* 教授教育领导力课程
* 开发和评估课程内容
* 提供学生指导和辅导
* 参与部门、学院和大学的治理工作
* 与外部机构建立联系
* 参与招生和留任工作
* 从事相关专业活动和研究

### 资格要求

* 博士或教育博士学位（Ph.D./Ed.D.）在教育领导力领域
* 领导经验在K-12学校设置中（传统公共学校或特许、独立、私人学校）
* 在毕业生层次上表现出教学卓越的潜力，基于之前的教学经验
* 支持博士研究项目的卓越潜力

### 优先考虑资格

* 教育领导力课程在硕士、教育专家和/或博士水平上的教学经验（包括混合和在线课程）
* 在特许、独立、私人学校专业化课程中的教学卓越潜力
* 在教育领导力或相关领域的研究贡献的明确潜力

### 工作环境

* Coastal Carolina University是一所公立综合性大学，位于康威（Conway），南卡罗来纳州，距离大西洋海岸度假城市迈尔斯堡（Myrtle Beach）仅9英里。
* 大学提供平等就业机会，无论种族、颜色、宗教、性别、性取向、性别认同、公民身份、国籍或因为员工或申请人是残疾人士或退伍军人、最近离职的军人、现役战争或战役勋章军人、其他“受保护者”（protected veteran）等因素。

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor

## Recruitment requirements
- Earned Ph.D./ Ed.D. degree in Educational Leadership
- Leadership experience in a K-12 school setting (traditional public schools or charter/independent/private schools)
- Potential for excellence in teaching at the graduate level based on previous teaching experience
- Potential for excellence in supporting doctoral research projects

## Summary
### 岗位概述

* 岗位名称：教育领导力助理/副教授
* 所属部门：教育科学与组织学系
* 工作类型：全职
* 开始日期：2026年8月15日
* 结束日期：无

### 岗位职责

* 教授教育领导力课程
* 开发和评估课程内容
* 提供学生指导和辅导
* 参与部门、学院和大学的治理工作
* 与外部机构建立联系
* 参与招生和留任工作
* 从事相关专业活动和研究

### 资格要求

* 博士或教育博士学位（Ph.D./Ed.D.）在教育领导力领域
* 领导经验在K-12学校设置中（传统公共学校或特许、独立、私人学校）
* 在毕业生层次上表现出教学卓越的潜力，基于之前的教学经验
* 支持博士研究项目的卓越潜力

### 优先考虑资格

* 教育领导力课程在硕士、教育专家和/或博士水平上的教学经验（包括混合和在线课程）
* 在特许、独立、私人学校专业化课程中的教学卓越潜力
* 在教育领导力或相关领域的研究贡献的明确潜力

### 工作环境

* Coastal Carolina University是一所公立综合性大学，位于康威（Conway），南卡罗来纳州，距离大西洋海岸度假城市迈尔斯堡（Myrtle Beach）仅9英里。
* 大学提供平等就业机会，无论种族、颜色、宗教、性别、性取向、性别认同、公民身份、国籍或因为员工或申请人是残疾人士或退伍军人、最近离职的军人、现役战争或战役勋章军人、其他“受保护者”（protected veteran）等因素。

 ## Title
South University: Adjunct Faculty - Nutrition

## Source
Job Search RSS

## Posted Date
2025-09-16T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37887678/adjunct-faculty-nutrition/?TrackID=10

## Location
Montgomery, Alabama, United States

## Salary
Competitive Salary

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
*   A master's degree in nutrition or a degree in a related discipline and 18 graduate hours in nutrition classes is required.
*   Graduate teaching assistants: master's in the teaching discipline or 18 graduate semester hours in the teaching discipline, direct supervision by a faculty member experienced in the teaching discipline, regular in-service training, and planned and periodic evaluations.
*   Experience in instruction or formalized education process, preferably in a post-secondary or college institution.
*   Membership in a professional association tied to the area of instruction preferred.
*   Active, valid, and unencumbered state licensure or certification as applicable to the discipline.

## Summary
###  **职位描述** 
South University的Adjunct Faculty - Nutrition职位要求具有nutrition或相关领域硕士学位，并且需要18个毕业小时的nutrition课程。该职位还要求有指导经验和专业协会成员资格。

###  **职责**
1.  管理教育过程，确保每个学生都参与积极的教育经历。
2.  执行教员责任，如Faculty Job Description中所述，并遵守Faculty Supplement to the South University Employee Handbook的条款。
3.  提供与South University模式一致的课程指导并支持在线学习环境。

###  **资格**
*   硕士学位或相关领域硕士学位，18个毕业小时的nutrition课程。
*   研究助教：教学领域硕士学位或18个学期小时的教学领域，直接指导经验丰富的教员，定期培训和计划评估。
*   指导经验或形式化教育过程，尤其是在后-secondary或大学机构中。
*   与教学领域相关的专业协会成员资格。
*   根据学科适用有效、无任何限制的州执照或认证。

###  **联系方式**
[www.southuniversity.edu](https://us242.dayforcehcm.com/MyDayforce/u/M4UMYFA2wUOpo3znFLLHgA/Common/www.southuniversity.edu)

title: Elementary School Teacher (Defined Term)
text:
Elementary School Teacher (Defined Term) Kamehameha Schools (Keaau, HI) ## Title
Elementary School Teacher (Defined Term)

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Teacher Education - Elementary

## Posted Date
2025-09-12T16:42:43Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179240689

## Location
Keaau, HI

## Salary
Not specified

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
*   Bachelor’s degree (degrees and course credits must be earned from a nationally or internationally accredited college or university)
*   Demonstrated knowledge of, and/or recent experience with using age appropriate instructional strategies (e.g. differentiated instruction, project-based learning, personalized learning)
*   Ability to utilize, create or develop current technology applications for adaption to classroom and/or instructional use
*   Recent teaching experience, coursework, or other activity in primary area(s) of instruction

## Summary
**Elementary School Teacher (Defined Term)**

Kamehameha Schools Hawai _?_ i Campus is seeking a kumu who thrives in collaboration, believes deeply in the power of personalized learning for mastery, and is called to uplift ?oiwi-serving education. This unique co-teaching position spans multiple grade levels and is designed to strengthen the impact of our kauhale teams through a focus on learner data and just-in-time instructional responses.

**Responsibilities:**

*   Partner with teachers to facilitate meaningful, data-driven conversations that lead to clear instructional priorities
*   Support the design of personalized interventions that honor each learner’s needs while upholding academic rigor
*   Provide guidance to build teacher confidence and capacity in using data to inform practice

**Requirements:**

*   Bachelor’s degree (degrees and course credits must be earned from a nationally or internationally accredited college or university)
*   Demonstrated knowledge of, and/or recent experience with using age appropriate instructional strategies (e.g. differentiated instruction, project-based learning, personalized learning)
*   Ability to utilize, create or develop current technology applications for adaption to classroom and/or instructional use
*   Recent teaching experience, coursework, or other activity in primary area(s) of instruction

**Preferred Qualifications:**

*   Bachelor’s degree in area related to one’s primary instructional responsibilities
*   Master’s or doctoral degrees in one’s primary area of instructional responsibilities
*   Demonstrated knowledge of, and/or recent experience with using age appropriate instructional strategies (e.g. differentiated instruction, project-based learning, personalized learning)
*   Ability to utilize, create or develop current technology applications for adaption to classroom and/or instructional use

**Job Type:**

This is a 1-Year Defined Term position for SY 25-26, with the possibility of converting into a Regular position.

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your application through HigherEdJobs.

title: Education Licensure Coordinator
text:
Education Licensure Coordinator Anna Maria College (Paxton, MA) ## Title
Education Licensure Coordinator

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Teacher Education

## Posted Date
2025-09-12T07:48:31Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179239732

## Location
Paxton, MA

## Salary
Not specified

## Keywords
*   Teacher Education
*   Curriculum and Instruction
*   Educational Technology
*   Literacy & Language Culture
*   Chinese Teaching
*   AI Instructional technology

## Recruitment requirements
*   Not specified

## Summary
### English
The Education Licensure Coordinator oversees and manages aspects of educator licensure within the institution's accredited Educator Preparation Program. This position works closely with the Chair of the Education Department and with Education faculty to oversee students' progress towards meeting Massachusetts licensure requirements.

### Chinese (中文)
教育许可协调员负责管理学校认可的教师资格培训计划中的教师资格认证方面。该职位与教育系主任和教育系教员密切合作，以监督学生遵循马萨诸塞州教师资格要求进行进展。

**Key Responsibilities:**

*   Maintain data collection for the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education including submitting the Title II report in collaboration with the Chair of the Education Dept.
*   Provide information to prospective students and follow-up.
*   Maintain budget for the Education Dept.
*   Coordinate; prepare materials, and record minutes of meetings for the Educator Preparation Advisory Council, Practicum Orientation, MTEL Preparation Sessions and others.
*   Attend Event Committee meetings for Education Department programs.
*   Maintain contact with pre-practicum students, practicum students, supervising practitioners, and school partners.

### Chinese (中文)
**主要职责:**

*   与教育系主任合作，收集数据并提交第二标题报告。
*   为潜在学生提供信息并跟进。
*   维护教育部门预算。
*   协调、准备材料，并记录指导委员会会议、实习导师会议、MTEL 准备会等的会议纪要。
*   参加教育系活动委员会会议。
*   与实习前学生、实习学生、指导教师和学校合作。

title: AI in Learning and Education - Curriculum & Instruction (Assistant, Associate, or Full Professor)
text:
AI in Learning and Education - Curriculum & Instruction (Assistant, Associate, or Full Professor) University of Texas at Austin (Austin, TX) ## Title
AI in Learning and Education - Curriculum & Instruction (Assistant, Associate, or Full Professor)

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Curriculum and Instruction

## Posted Date
2025-09-10T16:03:17Z

## Deadline
Open until filled

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179237639

## Location
University of Texas at Austin (Austin, TX)

## Salary
Not specified

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer, Literacy & Language Culture, Chinese Teaching, AI Instructional technology

## Recruitment requirements
*   A doctoral degree in curriculum and instruction in education or related fields earned by July 31, 2026.
*   Potential for or record of research that examines the application, implications, or innovations of using AI within EC-12 or higher education contexts.
*   Potential for or record of scholarly leadership (i.e., refereed publications, extramural funding).
*   Potential for or record of teaching and mentoring graduate students through chairing dissertation committees and guiding doctoral research projects.
*   Potential or record of using findings from their research agenda in their teaching and service.

## Summary
**该职位要求**
*   博士学位（教育或相关领域）于2026年7月31日前获得。
*   研究成果中，应至少有一个研究项目探讨了在EC-12或高等教育背景下使用AI的应用、影响或创新。
*   在教育或相关领域具有与该职位相关的学术领导经验（即被引用出版物和外部资金）。
*   具备指导博士论文委员会和导师研究项目的能力。
*   能够将研究成果应用于教学和服务。

**工作内容**
*   课程设计、评估和教学等领域的AI应用研究
*   AI工具在课堂中的使用研究
*   AI工具对课程设计、评估和教学过程的影响研究

**工作地点**
*   University of Texas at Austin (Austin, TX)

**联系方式**
*   通过HigherEdJobs申请

title: School of Education Clinical Supervisor-Part-time--Independent Consultant Position
text:
School of Education Clinical Supervisor-Part-time--Independent Consultant Position Fairleigh Dickinson University (Teaneck, NJ) ## Title
School of Education Clinical Supervisor-Part-time--Independent Consultant Position

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Teacher Education

## Posted Date
2025-09-09T17:29:07Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179236420

## Location
Teaneck, NJ

## Salary
$135.00/Observation

## Keywords
*   Teacher Education
*   Curriculum and Instruction
*   Educational Technology
*   Literacy & Language Culture
*   Chinese Teaching
*   AI Instructional technology

## Recruitment requirements
*   Experienced educators
*   Ability to serve as liaisons between FDU and partnering schools
*   Conduct observations using FDU approved inventories

## Summary
Fairleigh Dickinson University is seeking experienced educators to serve as clinical supervisors for graduate students in School of Education programs. For the fall semester, this role will support either paraprofessionals participating in FDU's PARE (Paraprofessional Alternate Route Educators) Grant Program or Reading Specialists employed in schools throughout New Jersey.

*   Observe and evaluate paraprofessional teacher or Reading Specialist candidates during their practicum placements
*   Conduct goal-setting, pre-observation, and post-observation conferences at least every other week during the semester (PARE) or three times during the semester (Reading Specialists)
*   Serve as liaisons between FDU and partnering schools, ensuring alignment between university expectations and school-based practices

This is a meaningful opportunity to contribute to the development of future educators.

title: Adjunct - Teacher Education (Fall 2025 - Summer 2026)
text:
Adjunct - Teacher Education (Fall 2025 - Summer 2026) Wright State University (Dayton, OH) ## Title
Adjunct - Teacher Education (Fall 2025 - Summer 2026)

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Wright State University

## Posted Date
09/09/2025 

## Deadline
Open Until Filled 

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179236082

## Location
Dayton, OH 

## Salary
Negotiable 

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
*   Professional experience or academic qualifications covering subject matter taught within the Teacher Education and Field Experiences.
*   Applicant must possess an academic degree one level above the level at which they will teach, except in programs for terminal degrees or when equivalent experience is established. In terminal degree programs, adjunct faculty must possess the same level of degree.
*   If teaching outside field of their advanced degree, adjuncts must have completed at least 18 graduate level credit hours of instruction in the field where they teach.
*   At least 1 year professional or teaching experience unless otherwise noted.

## Summary
**Job Title:** Adjunct - Teacher Education (Fall 2025 - Summer 2026)
**Job Type:** Part-time 
**Department:** Teacher Education
**Location:** Dayton, OH 
**Job Description:**
WSU's Teacher Education is accepting applications for adjunct teaching positions for Fall 2025 through Summer 2026 semesters. Individuals with academic and performance qualifications for the ranks of adjunct instructor through adjunct professor are encouraged to apply for positions in the following disciplines: Field Experiences, Teacher Education.
**Requirements:**
*   Professional experience or academic qualifications covering subject matter taught within the Teacher Education and Field Experiences.
*   Applicant must possess an academic degree one level above the level at which they will teach, except in programs for terminal degrees or when equivalent experience is established. In terminal degree programs, adjunct faculty must possess the same level of degree.
*   If teaching outside field of their advanced degree, adjuncts must have completed at least 18 graduate level credit hours of instruction in the field where they teach.
*   At least 1 year professional or teaching experience unless otherwise noted.

**How to Apply:**
Apply Now at https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179236082

Salary Grade UC. Please see [Staff Compensation Structure](https://www.hrm.msstate.edu/pdf/Staff%20Compensation%20Structure%2010072019.pdf "Staff Compensation Structure") or [Skilled Crafts and Service Maintenance Compensation Schedule](https://www.hrm.msstate.edu/compensation/scp/schedule/Skilled_Crafts_and_Serv_Maint_Annualized_Salary.php) for salary ranges.

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
* Master's degree in Elementary Education or a related field; two years of experience as an elementary/middle school teacher; and demonstration of potential for excellence in teaching.
* Preferred Qualifications:
	+ Doctorate in Elementary Education or related field. 
	+ More than 2 years of experience as an elementary/middle school teacher
	+ National Board Certification
	+ Experience with CAEP Accreditation
	+ Experience with online and hybrid teaching methodologies

## Summary
### 岗位信息
* 岗位名称：Instructor l or II
* 部门：教育学院
* 地点：密西西比州梅里迪安

* 结束日期：不明确

* 提供服务和社区 outreach

* 在线和混合教学方法经验

* 联系方式：不明确

 ## Title
The University of Tennessee, Knoxville: 2026-27 Faculty Openings

## Source
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37879535/2026-27-faculty-openings/?TrackID=10

## Posted Date
2025-09-03T04:00:00.000Z

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://jobs.chronicle.com/job/37879535/2026-27-faculty-openings/?TrackID=10

## Location
Tennessee, United States

## Salary
Salary Not Specified

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
* Tenure-track positions available
* Assistant Professor positions available in various departments (Counselor Education, Education Policy, Higher Education, Sport Analytics, Sport Management, Public Health, Food and Consumer Behavior, Hospitality and Tourism Management, Elementary Education, Literacy Education)
* Ph.D. required for most positions

## Summary
### **2026-27 Faculty Openings**

The University of Tennessee, Knoxville (UTK) is seeking qualified candidates for various tenure-track faculty positions. The university is located near the beautiful Smoky Mountains and has a diverse range of academic programs.

**Available Positions:**

*   Assistant Professor – Counselor Education
*   Associate/Full Professor – Education Policy
*   Assistant Professor – Higher Education
*   Assistant Professor – Sport Analytics
*   Assistant Professor – Sport Management
*   Assistant/Associate Professor – Public Health
*   Assistant Professor – Food and Consumer Behavior
*   Assistant Professor – Hospitality and Tourism Management
*   Assistant/Associate Professor – Elementary Education
*   Assistant/Associate Professor – Literacy Education

**Qualifications:**

*   Ph.D. required for most positions
*   Tenure-track positions available
*   Located near the beautiful Smoky Mountains, The University of Tennessee, Knoxville (UTK) was founded in 1794 and is one of the oldest public universities in the country.

### **Equal Employment Opportunity Statement:**

The University of Tennessee affirmatively states that it does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, or disability in its education programs and activities, and this policy extends to employment by the university. Requests for accommodation of a disability should be directed to the ADA Coordinator at Equal Opportunity and Accessibility, 1840 Melrose Avenue, Knoxville, TN 37996-3560, by email to [eoa@utk.edu](mailto:eoa@utk.edu), or by phone at 865-974-2498.

## Summary
### **中文**
该职位为全职教师实习导师，地点位于北卡罗来纳州托马斯维尔。具体要求如下：

* 有教育技术和课程指导经验的教师或教育学者
* 能够指导学生在实践中学习和发展教学技能
* 具有强烈的服务意识和团队合作精神
* 能够有效地与学生、教师和其他利益相关者沟通和协作

该职位要求能够提供高质量的指导，帮助学生提高教学能力，并为他们提供实践经验。该职位还需要具有强烈的服务意识和团队合作精神，以便与学生、教师和其他利益相关者有效地沟通和协作。

### **English**
This position is for a part-time Teacher Residency Coach, located in Thomasville, NC. The requirements are:

* Teachers or education scholars with experience in educational technology and curriculum instruction
* Ability to guide students in developing teaching skills through practice
* Strong service orientation and teamwork spirit
* Effective communication and collaboration skills with students, teachers, and other stakeholders

The position requires providing high-quality guidance to help students improve their teaching abilities and provide them with practical experience. The position also needs a strong service orientation and teamwork spirit to effectively communicate and collaborate with students, teachers, and other stakeholders.

title: Lecturer of Education
text:
Lecturer of Education Gordon State College (Barnesville, GA) ## Title
Lecturer of Education

## Source
HigherEdJobs

## Posted Date
Not specified

## Deadline
Not specified

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179227292

## Location
Gordon State College, Barnesville, GA

## Salary
Not specified

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer

## Recruitment requirements
- Master's Degree or above in Special Education, Secondary Education, Curriculum and Instruction or related field in education.
- K-12 public school teaching experience.

## Summary 
### 岗位描述
该岗位为教育讲师，主要负责教学教育课程。候选人还可能被要求在部门、学校和学院委员会上任职，并参与专业发展。

### 责任
- 教授适合其任命和资质的本科课程。
- 计划和举行有助于创造有效学习环境并帮助学生达到大学、学科标准和外部认证机构要求的课程。
- 编制、管理和评估与教育成果相关的考试和作业。这些评估应基于学生表现。
- 参加学生入学和注册活动，根据需要。
- 在部门、学院或系统级别上担任教职员工委员会成员，如由教职员工选举或行政人员任命。
- 为大学和社区提供专业知识，以便与同事、学校、企业和其他组织分享。
- 每周保持所需的办公时间。
- 可能帮助学生招募时要求。
- 及时和规律地完成工作责任。
- 根据需要在晚上和离校授课。
- 参加大学正式学术仪式，包括总统致辞和毕业典礼，并在这些场合穿着适当的学术服装。

### 资格
- 硕士或以上学位，在特殊教育、初级教育、课程与教学或相关领域的教育。
- K-12 公共学校教学经验。

### 优先资格
- 候选人应具有成功的大学教书经历，包括面对面和在线教学。
- 在硕士学位之外，额外的18个研究生小时在特殊教育、初级教育或初级教育中。

Not specified

Curriculum and Instruction, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Lecturer

## Recruitment requirements
- Master's Degree or above in Special Education, Secondary Education, Curriculum and Instruction or related field in education.
- K-12 public school teaching experience.

## Summary 
### 岗位描述
该岗位为教育讲师，主要负责教学教育课程。候选人还可能被要求在部门、学校和学院委员会上任职，并参与专业发展。

### 责任
- 教授适合其任命和资质的本科课程。
- 计划和举行有助于创造有效学习环境并帮助学生达到大学、学科标准和外部认证机构要求的课程。
- 编制、管理和评估与教育成果相关的考试和作业。这些评估应基于学生表现。
- 参加学生入学和注册活动，根据需要。
- 在部门、学院或系统级别上担任教职员工委员会成员，如由教职员工选举或行政人员任命。
- 为大学和社区提供专业知识，以便与同事、学校、企业和其他组织分享。
- 每周保持所需的办公时间。
- 可能帮助学生招募时要求。
- 及时和规律地完成工作责任。
- 根据需要在晚上和离校授课。
- 参加大学正式学术仪式，包括总统致辞和毕业典礼，并在这些场合穿着适当的学术服装。

### 资格
- 硕士或以上学位，在特殊教育、初级教育、课程与教学或相关领域的教育。
- K-12 公共学校教学经验。

### 优先资格
- 候选人应具有成功的大学教书经历，包括面对面和在线教学。
- 在硕士学位之外，额外的18个研究生小时在特殊教育、初级教育或初级教育中。
- 文字教育背景
- 成功的P-12教学经验

title: Professional Development for Educators Pool- 2025/2026: Educational Practice & Research
text:
Professional Development for Educators Pool- 2025/2026: Educational Practice & Research Oregon State University (Corvallis, OR) ## Title
Professional Development for Educators Pool- 2025/2026: Educational Practice & Research

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Teacher Education

## Posted Date
Not specified

## Deadline
06/30/2026

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179224430

## Location
Corvallis, OR

## Salary
$28.00 - $31.00 per hour (recommended full-time salary range)

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education

## Recruitment requirements
* Bachelor's degree in Education or a closely related field.
* Master's degree in Education or a closely related field is preferred.
* Experience developing and/or delivering online courses is desired.
* One year of experience working as an educator is required.

## Summary
### 专业发展教育师团队2025/2026：教育实践与研究

该职位属于教育学院的专业发展教育师团队，招聘一名专家2-教学的全职或兼职人员。该团队负责开发和实施在线课程和工作坊，为教育领域的学者、企业和培训专业人士提供非学分课程。

### 责任

* 开发和实施非学分课程
* 参与必要的培训和会议，以在OSU的学习管理系统（Canvas）中保持和教学适当技术。
* 有经验的教学、培训或促进学习或开发课程内容领域。
* 课程旨在促进实践性学习和学生从各种背景下取得成功。

### 资格

* 学士学位教育或相关领域
* 硕士学位教育或相关领域是理想的
* 开发和/或提供在线课程的经验是有吸引力的
* 一年以上的教育工作经验是需要的

### 工作条件/工作时间表

办公室空间在OSU的科尔维斯校区Furman Hall提供。然而，大多数工作可以远程完成。每周定期会议与PDE经理进行面对面或视频会议。

### 薪水
小时工资：$28.00 - $31.00

### 应聘信息

* 应用截止日期：06/30/2026
* 联系人：Sara Schley
* 电子邮件：[sara.schley@oregonstate.edu](mailto:sara.schley@oregonstate.edu)
* 招聘网址：https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179224430

title: Reading Instructor/Assistant Professor (14642)
text:
Reading Instructor/Assistant Professor (14642) Montgomery County Community College (Blue Bell, PA) ## Title
Reading Instructor/Assistant Professor (14642)

## Source
HigherEdJobs - Reading and Literacy

## Posted Date
2025-08-22

## Deadline
Until filled. Review of applications will take place after Sunday, September 15, 2025.

## Application Link
https://www.higheredjobs.com/details.cfm?JobCode=179223920

## Location
Blue Bell/Pottstown (Assignment for Blue Bell campus and/or Pottstown campus)

## Salary
$63,000 (2025-2026 faculty contract rate)

## Keywords
Curriculum and Instruction, Educational Technology, Teacher Education, tenure-track, Assistant Professor, Literacy & Language Culture

## Recruitment requirements
*   Master's degree in Reading, Reading Education, Literacy, English, Education, or closely related field with appropriate college-level teaching experience from an accredited institution required.
*   Demonstrated ability to teach undergraduates of all abilities. Community College teaching experience preferred.
*   Ability to accommodate students with various skill levels and learning needs in order to address specific reading challenges.
*   Ability to provide constructive and actionable feedback on student reading comprehension, critical thinking, and written responses to texts.
*   Demonstrated expertise in reading pedagogy, including diagnostic assessment, reading strategies for comprehension, vocabulary, fluency, and critical thinking.
*   Demonstrated commitment to student engagement in reading courses to enhance retention and timely progress to degree completion.
*   Evidence of continued professional growth and development.
*   Demonstrated commitment to the use of innovative instructional techniques and technologies and use of course management systems
*   Demonstrated commitment to the use of a variety of teaching activities to address diverse learning styles.
*   Demonstrated commitment to the incorporation of information literacy resources, technology, research, writing and culturally diverse perspectives into the curriculum.
*    Knowledge of competency-based education preferred.
*   Demonstrated commitment to continual assessment of the teaching-learning process.
*    Demonstrated commitment to work with diverse populations, such as under-resourced groups and first-generation students.
*    Demonstrated understanding of and commitment to a comprehensive community college philosophy.

## Summary
### **职位描述**

*   教授指定课程，遵循学院批准的课程描述和学生学习成果。
*   将适当的教学策略、技术和评估方法整合到课程中，以评估学生学习。
*   在课程中合理地包含信息素养和写作。
*   根据学院的指南准备和提交课程大纲。
*   满足所有预定的课堂并遵守学术日程，包括最后考试时间和其他程序相关测试。
*   评估学生学习成果，并将结果整合到学科适当的课程规划和个人专业发展活动中。
*   参与课程、课程和项目评估活动。
*   与程序协调员/程序主任/分部院长合作开发和修订课程和课程。
*   促进学生实现学习成果，如持续反馈和必要时咨询。
*   保持预定的办公时间。
*   提交关于学生出席和课程进度的必填报告，按照发布的截止日期。
*   与适当的学生服务人员合作，解决可能需要特殊关注的学生问题。
*   促进专业发展以保持学科知识和教学方法的最新状态。
*   参加预定的分部、学科和全体教职员会议，并参与学生咨询、教职员专业发展日、开幕式和毕业典礼，根据合同要求。
*    为学院提供服务并代表学院在社区中发挥作用，如 Collective Bargaining Agreement 和 Faculty Promotion Guidelines 中规定的那样。
*    遵守职业和道德行为标准。
*   位置特定职责（适当）

### **资格**

*   硕士或以上学位，必须在阅读、阅读教育、文学、教育或相关领域有适当的大学级别教学经验，从认可的机构获得。
*   能够教所有能力水平的本科生。社区学院教学经验优先考虑。
*   能够适应各种技能水平和学习需求，以解决特定的阅读挑战。
*   提供学生对读书理解、批判性思维和写作回应的建设性的和可操作的反馈能力。
*   阅读学科领域中诊断评估、理解策略、词汇、流利度和批判性思维的专业知识。
*   提高学生在阅读课程中的参与度，以促进保留并及时完成学位的承诺。
*   继续专业发展的证据。
*   使用创新教学技术和技术以及

*   Valid teaching license (Preferred Qualification)
*   Prior and/or current teaching in K-12 setting (Preferred Qualification)
*   Experience teaching on-line or hybrid courses (Preferred Qualification)

## Summary
### 招聘信息

**招聘单位:** 肯尼索州立大学（Kennesaw State University）
**招聘职位:** 中学教育和中学教育部分时间和有限期限教员职位

**招聘人数:** 不明确

### 岗位描述

肯尼索州立大学正在寻找一名中等级别的部分时间和有限期限教员来担任中学教育和中学教育部门的职责。这些职位是根据需求，学期为期半年。

### 责任

*   教授本科和/或研究生课程
*   进行教育指导

### 资格要求

*   本科和/或研究生课程教授或进行教育指导：需有至少硕士学位，或其外国等同学历，在教育或相关领域。
*   研究生课程教授：需有终极博士学位，或其外国等同学历，在教育或相关领域。

### 优先考虑

*   有教龄证书
*   在K-12环境中进行教学经验
*   在线或混合课程教学经验

### 应聘要求

1.  CV
2.  面谈信
3.  未经验证的成绩单（正式成绩单和正式国际课程评估在录用后提供）
4.  至少三位参考人的姓名、电话号码和电子邮件地址

该职位为终身制助理/副教授职位，隶属于University of Tennessee, Knoxville的教育学系。要求具有小学教育领域的博士学位或相关领域的硕士学位，并有教学经验。该职位需要在课程与教学、教育技术以及教师教育等方面取得突破性成果。具体要求如下：

* 拥有小学教育领域的博士学位或相关领域的硕士学位
* 具有教学经验
* 在课程与教学、教育技术以及教师教育等方面取得突破性成果
* 具备中文教学能力
* 能够使用AI instructional technology

## Source

## Location
Chicago, IL

## Salary
Not specified

## Keywords
* Curriculum and Instruction
* Educational Technology
* Teacher Education
* Literacy & Language Culture

## Recruitment requirements
* Tenure-track position
* Assistant Professor or Lecturer position
* Specialization in Chinese Teaching or AI Instructional technology

## Summary
### **Job Description**

*   National Louis University (Chicago, IL) is seeking an Assistant Professor of Elementary Education.
*   The successful candidate will be responsible for teaching courses in elementary education, curriculum and instruction, educational technology, and literacy & language culture.
*   They will also contribute to the development of the Teacher Education program.

### **Requirements**

*   A Ph.D. in Elementary Education or a related field
*   Experience in teaching and research in elementary education
*   Strong background in curriculum and instruction, educational technology, and teacher education
*   Ability to teach courses in Chinese Teaching or AI Instructional technology

### **Responsibilities**

*   Teach undergraduate and graduate courses in elementary education
*   Develop and implement new courses and programs
*   Conduct research and publish scholarly articles
*   Serve on departmental and university committees

## Summary
**职位描述**
 Shenandoah University 的营养与饮食学系正在寻找一名合格的候选人来填补一个职位，负责指导实践经验学习。该职位要求具有丰富的教学和管理经验。

* 负责营养与饮食学系的实践经验学习计划
* 与其他部门合作，确保学生获得高质量的教育和实践经验
* 管理和评估实践经验学习计划的进展
* 与教职员工、学生和其他利益相关者合作，促进营养与饮食学系的发展

**资格要求**
* 高级学位（博士或硕士）
* 教育背景和教学经验
* 管理和领导能力
* 良好的沟通和团队合作技能
